website_summaries.verdict: If you want a white model and don't mind that the graphic isn't very bold, this one is worth considering – but while it's appealing, don't expect the design to stand out.
pros: Has an attractive pattern on bright, white background, which appeals to those who prefer a lighter color
cons: Several owners were disappointed that the design wasn't as metallic as expected, and seemed to be somewhat faded

customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic but..
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic at first. Seeing people with this round thing on the backs of their phones. Then I purchased one. And the first few days, I didnt like it. But a co-worker told me it takes a few days to get use to it. Now, I'm wondering where this nifty device has been all my life! Makes holding my phone so much easier. Definitely notice a different in how my thumbs and wrists feels after a long day of work. One thing to note is to not press it down until 100% sure it's in the right spot. The adhesive is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, sticky back doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the sticky lasted less than three months, which is why it doesn’t get five stars. Other than that, the invention itself is a genius lifesaver. Keeps my fingers happy and my phone from falling on my face or sleeping baby. Aside from the intended functionality, I very much enjoy the fidget value. It spins and pops up/down, two levels. I know this probably went into the diminished life of the sticky back. However, I intend to super glue this bad boy to my case, so I’m not too fussed.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Orange not gold
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the gold color. This pop socket looks nothing like the advertisement. It’s a dull orange color instead of the vibrant metallic gold you see in the pictures. There isn’t a hint of metallic paint on this thing. Returning it. One good thing to note: I was shopping at a store and found the same exact pop socket for more than twice the price. So the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphyre

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift;
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t happy with how this looked when it arrived. I had to clean it because it had some tacky substance on its face, and the suction part was a little scuffed. It was not a shiny gold as depicted in the photo; it was matte. I can’t speak to the quality of the suction since I purchased this as a gift for someone, So I’m giving it the benefit of the doubt with three stars.
customer_reviews.author: JRAD

customer_reviews.title: Why am I just now trying this???
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying one of these because I purchased an off brand one years ago and wasn’t impressed. After getting a new phone I decided to try one out after suggestions from friends. I LOVE my Popsocket! I have spasms due to medical conditions so I have always dropped my phones and have had to replace them. Because of the Popsocket I’ve not dropped my phone once since applying it to my phone. It is well made with sturdy material, easy to apply and it has been holding to my phone case without any issues. If you have tried an off brand one and were disappointed—-I highly suggest giving the name brand one’s a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for at least a few weeks and it seems to be very durable. It flattens and opens very easily and definitely helps you grip the phone without dropping it. The design is beautiful also. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I suggest you DON'T BUY FROM THIS SELLER. I like the idea of a pop socket. The first one I had the top disk popped off and I lost it. I decided to get another because it's easy to hang on dash when driving. But this one was obviously used. The peel off on the sticky side had hair and dirt stuck. I'm not returning it because it's too much of a bother and I have it. But I suggest you DON'T BUY FROM THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped incorrect color, fell off in less than three weeks
customer_reviews.text: This fell off after 18 days. It didn’t even last a whole month The pop socket didn’t hold my phone up in the leaning horizontal position. It tips right over. They also sent the completely incorrect product. I ordered the white and gold, but received the black and gold product. I would not recommend. Also, as other reviews had said, this was much closer to orange than gold. I had this same gold one in the past that was actually gold. I hoped it would’ve been the same for this one but was wrong
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: Its super cute but doesn't stick at all. I bought a pop socket one at Target at xmas and I had to pry it off my phone with a butter knife both times I transferred it. This one came off in less than 24 hours. Really disappointed I wasted $9 on this and will have to go out and buy one from the store
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quick

customer_reviews.title: Flimsier than before,,
customer_reviews.text: This was the second Popsocket that we purchased for my wife's phone. The first lasted about a year till one day it released from the phone. She used it and liked the design so we decided to replace it with the same style and color. We received the new just fine but after putting it on the phone there were problems. The socket doesn't open as far so it's harder to get her fingers between it and the phone. Also the plastic used to make it is flimsier and when pulled isn't strong enough to hold the phone as a stand, and falls over. They have made it even cheaper that it was.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems attaching the item to my iphone. I've had it for quite some time now and have not had any issues with it not sticking properly. The picture suggests more of a glitter design; however, it is flat gold. Other than that, I love the pop socket and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured 👎
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a white popsocket as pictured and received one with the black base. Disappointed with the black but it's a cute design so I'll just keep it. Just beware you might not get the all white one.
customer_reviews.author: kak97

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy install, but More Brownish than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use on my iPhone 7 Plus. Easy to install. They only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because it’s more brown than I expected. I know the design wasn’t all gold, but I didn’t expect it to be as brown as it. But all in all, love the design and the product
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance, but not a good value for the price. (1)The space where fingers are placed beneath the Popsocket is too small for my fingers even though my fingers are thin. (2)The stickiness is not adequate to keep the Popsocket attached to the phone. It is now a useless Popsocket within a week of receiving it ( and, yes, I know the right way to stick it onto the smooth surface of the iphone).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bim

customer_reviews.title: I love my pop sockets
customer_reviews.text: super cute & it lasts. i’ve had it for over a year and no issues. I do switch out my phone cases now and again and they all have their own pop socket, but if you’re looking into getting one i’d definitely go with the pop socket brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon J Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Colors aren’t as shown but functional
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers that the color is closer to a brown than gold, and a little faded. However, I’ve been looking for a pop socket where the lid comes off to add a magnetic plate, and use it for the magnetic mount in my car. Tired of the other magnetic rings I’ve been using where the color/paint chips off and then the ring breaking off after repetitive use.
customer_reviews.author: J Shiu

customer_reviews.title: This popsocket is the worst! It is not compatible with certain cases
customer_reviews.text: This popsocket is the worst! It is not compatible with certain cases. I just received the order today and the popsocket will not stick to my phone. The glue is cheap and i do not recommend. Save your money and don't order from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Stand
customer_reviews.text: Don’t see how it lives up to the expectation of working as a stand. I’ve 6s+ that it fails to hold on standing position every single time I’ve tried ever since I installed it. Only good for holding phone as a grip, nothing else. I was looking to have this as a stand, didn’t really about the holding but it fails to work as stand.
customer_reviews.author: Romael

customer_reviews.title: ocean socket? lol
customer_reviews.text: lasted so long until it fell off into the ocean I had gotten my phone wet and it fell off which is okay but it was a great pop socket.
customer_reviews.author: Cirenna Koester

customer_reviews.title: Falls Off
customer_reviews.text: While I understand that this product is meant to be taken off to be relocated, I wasn't expecting it to just fall off. Each time I am on my phone for more then 10-15 (Say on a phone call) and I am holding it the adhesive warms up just enough and releases from the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive gone after a month
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and function except of all Pop Sockets I've had the adhesive on this was non-exist after just over a month; I had to purchase a separate package of adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Not a good popsocket!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this popsocket! I got it a week ago and the top part already came off and I have no idea where is it!l and it’s not sticking that well!!
customer_reviews.author: joana

customer_reviews.title: You literally get what you see.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another pop socket in Black and for some reason it's easier to use than this one, not sure why. Also the design printed on it is not shimmery like the pictures lead you to believe. It's literally what you see. I was disappointed that it wasn't shimmery.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wayman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible- never stuck to my case.  Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this purchase. I’ve used one other pop socket in the past and it never came off of my case. This one however, never stayed on. I’m very disappointed, as I loved the design. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. I can’t figure out how to contact sellers and return window is closed because it’s been over a month, even though it hasn’t even been 2 months. The two main pieces seperated and it started to discolor before that.
customer_reviews.author: pamtish

customer_reviews.title: It works and is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what these pop socket things were. I've seen others use them. They are handy when gripping your phone. This one doesn't stand that great. But I never need my phone to stand anyways. The design is cute. Once you put it on...it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Wenday

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: First day putting it on my phone it kept falling off. Returned right away. On the other hand the product came in dirty. At first I thought it was just the plastic over it. But ended up being the pop socket instead. I needed to baby wipe off the black stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: dalena

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: It never stayed on my phone. I put it on the back of a brand new clean iphone and it never stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sticks so we'll I don't imagine I can get it off. I did think it'd have more sparkle but still cute!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Pawly

customer_reviews.title: Great, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I think the rubber could be a little more sturdy and I think they should make the tops like this also a swappable top. I like being able to take the top off to put a metal piece in for my magnet car mount.
customer_reviews.author: Stown77.2

customer_reviews.title: Adds Comfort to Phone use
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and sturdy. Functions as hand grip support and propping device for hands free use. Easy to remove and reapply. Washable with soap and water. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: diane croitor

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how i had a phone so many years without one of these. I can now hold on to my phone so much easier, take photos, prop my phone up etc. Popsocket inventors are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good! It just doesn’t stick very well if your hands are hot? Lol but it does stick off at some point so just be aware. It’s good though!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Martinez Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Weird and floppy
customer_reviews.text: I used it for only a little while before realizing it was really floppy. I’ve since replaced mine for something a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: E2

customer_reviews.title: Good thing
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a year. Still works and in great condition still. Quality is good. Would buy again. Although, the picture shows as if the design is shiny (the way I saw it) but design is mette ( not sparkling as I hoped/ thought).
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: not durable.
customer_reviews.text: i loved the design. i ordered two. the first one cracked after 3 months (i never dropped it or anything) and the second one lasted about a week because the cover with the design kept falling out every 3 seconds. i eventually lost it because it fell out of my pocket while i was walking down the street.
customer_reviews.author: medina alcodray

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pop socket it’s such good quality and I switched it to 4 or 5 different cases and it didn’t run out of sticky until my last case would only recommend switching it to a different case once or twice
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh russell

customer_reviews.title: Bash
customer_reviews.text: Never adhered to my phone like previous Popsockets have. I switched the base for a different socket but the top broke immediately after the return window closed. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashveena

customer_reviews.title: will not restick as stated...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my popsocket until I had to remove it and apply it on another case. I did as instructed and tried to apply it to my new phone and it would not stay on. I had to purchase another popsocket... other than that, the design matched the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Panitha Venethongkham

customer_reviews.title: Not a good pop socket
customer_reviews.text: My pop socket arrived yesterday and the adhesive is not sticky it’s fallen off of my phone several times and has caused me to drop my phone because of it which I am not happy about
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glue came undone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the golden mandala. The design is beautiful and the decal looks elegant. I have used pop sockets a lot; this is the first time the glue became undone in 2 months of use. Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Parimala

customer_reviews.title: Great pop socket
customer_reviews.text: Cute pop socket, I saw this same one in target for almost double the price. I’ve had this socket on my phone for about 2 months. So far it remains intact.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Villafana

customer_reviews.title: DON’T waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. First off, the image on the front is blurry, not detailed at all like it is on the picture. The pop socket only lasted a day before it started sliding on my phone and popping off every 5 minutes. The adhesive is not sticky at all so it constantly falls off whenever I grip my phone. Definitely not worth the money I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Assata

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I’ve put this thing through HELL! And I even pop it back and forth sometimes when I’m bored and it withstands all that and works as if it’s fresh out the package! Worth the money and lasts long!
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: No twist lock but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but does not twist lock. It’s a pull out/push in. Fast shipping. Packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but do not purchase unless your case is smooth, or you don't use a case.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that this popsocket would adhere to any surface fine, but it's awful for my phones case or even my tablet, which I guess is too heavy for it to hold. It's cute, but it doesn't work how I wanted it too or how I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better pop sockets I bought it a long time ago and it still is on my phone w no problem I use it with a life proof case and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It’s a PopSocket
customer_reviews.text: I received the pop socket today. Put it on the case. Stuck well. Let’s see how it lasts. The picture of the pop socket looked better online. I wish it the color would pop out more.
customer_reviews.author: O.S.

customer_reviews.title: This is crap. My last one was sticky and worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned pop sockets before but got a new phone case so needed a new one. This is crap. My last one was sticky and worked for two years. This worked literally one day and fell off...so I even tried to restick it, nope.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same quality as I previously ordered. They fold up instead of staying open and thus are useless as a phone stand. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: susan123

customer_reviews.title: It arrived with dirt and grime stuck on the adhesive. GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: It shipped within a few days, BUT upon opening I realized it was not “new”. It had a rim of grime/dirt around the exposed adhesive back side. The printed side also had grime spots on it. Kinda gross thinking I got someone’s return and someone else’s grime. Especially now days. Eeeew David!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, I found myself fiddling with it nonstop and it never broke or popped off. Looked just like the pictures. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and I’m very disappointed. It will not stand up the phone. It keeps collapsing and the phone falls. I’m upset about this.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had pop sockets in the past so I know how to use one, but this one was a huge waste of my money. It doesn’t hold my phone up (a very cheap product all together) and the top part of the pop socket (that has the design) continues to come off of its stand. Please do not buy this product on amazon! Buy it at your local store for just $4 more!! I was very disappointed, but now I know better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ward

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to glass phone case
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these popsockets on my old phone and bought another when I upgraded. I love my tempered glass case but nothing sticks to it, including this popsocket. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: Mneah
customer_reviews.text: It will fall off after a couple of months. That said, pretty pricey for smth that will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Schmiedl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little gadget if the adhesive holds up
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pop socket. I loved the first one which lasted nearly a year. This one started coming off after about a month and a half and I would put it back on and it would stay a little while and then fall off. Perhaps there wasn’t enough adhesive. I was very careful to put it on an absolutely clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra VanGilder

customer_reviews.title: Great designs. Easy to apply.  Better grip
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My phone is slippery so I feel like I have a better grip on it and am less likely to drop it
customer_reviews.author: Neal M. Askew

customer_reviews.title: I love PopSockets!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to open/close, able to be used as a stand to watch videos or follow along with a recipe video! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: it’s a beautiful pattern and all but the pop socket itself is kinda hard (to collapse and extend) and one alone can not withstand the weight of my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I bought this several months ago and it still is going strong. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - this is NOT shiny!
customer_reviews.text: This is not gold. It's not shiny. It dull and printed to make it look as though it's "shiny"
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My last one lasted almost 3 years, so I'm hoping this one does the same!
customer_reviews.author: CorrieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Color isn’t as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The item pictured has a white base but the one I got is black
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on the phone, but it broke after a few months. Not terrible for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Fell off within the first 20 min of using it and the adhesive keeps coming off. Doesn’t stick. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Monet Rahall

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love it! As other reviewers have said, it isn't metallic as the pictures would have you to believe, but it looks good enough for me. I haven't seen any staining or any of the image wearing off. It was easy to install on my phone and hasn't fallen off after much use. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cherosioux King

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy, has never come off after application. Has kept its color throughout a lot of sun exposure, owned for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pop socket works great for me. No problems at all. Pretty patterns also.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pearsick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! Wondering if the flower thing has a meaning behind it, but it’s pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Print is not gold metallic
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Picture looked like it was gold metallic. Print is not metallic, rather a disappointing gradient of yellow and brown.
customer_reviews.author: Tess R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother it’s fake
customer_reviews.text: Not the real popsocket, it’s a fake one at the price of a real one
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana G

customer_reviews.title: Came already used
customer_reviews.text: The product came completely useless. The adhesive was not in the slightest sticky and came without the covering to the adhesive layer. That being, in travel the stickiness stuck to the shipping bag and became utterly useless upon arrival. Would. Never. Buy. Again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth G

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product in the past and it worked fine, however, I order another one and it won’t stick to my new iPhone X max.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing!! It lasted forever!! Honestly, it would still be on my phone but I kept playing with it and I tore it up after 3+ months with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pop socket. The only issue I have had is that the design is fading but I’ve had it for about 10 months so thats expected since it is in my hand/pocket all the time getting rubbed off. I’d recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: It glued pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I bough this pop socket about a month ago and I loved. It glued pretty well. It’s how I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Was fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Broke the item in less than 2 weeks. Was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Would recomend
customer_reviews.text: Had it a while and it’s still on my case and doing it’s job. Really nice design too. Looks as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: Popsocket arrived as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as pictured, but the top part spins/ moves. Therefore, it wobbles all over the place when i attach this to the popsocket car mount. Is this a defect or just how they are? Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought from the seller. Liked it so much I got a second one to go in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Williamsx2

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they lasted longer. The sticky part gives up after a few weeks. But you keep buying them because you invested in a mount and because they are very convenient. But it's a 10 dollar investment every month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Jace

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as stocking stuffer. Does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a different brand and it. Would.not.stick! Kept coming off. Got annoyed with it, ordered a Popsocket and it stays put. *Reminder that buying cheap usually ends up costing you more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cool product, ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful for holding the phone. The glue did not work really well so I ended up having to use super glue. The mandala lasts a while but will eventually fade out.
customer_reviews.author: Taynara

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: This product had a hard time sticking on to the case... My phone fell twice because of this. Not sure if this is a fake popsocket because my last one worked 100%. Issuing a refund...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate web description
customer_reviews.text: The product on the website is white with golden graphics. I received black pop socket with golden graphics. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemorphos🦋

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. The pattern is perfect on my colorful case. Had it for a few months now - was really easy to install and is durable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wolak

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be shiny gold as pictured but it’s not. It’s flat/dull and looks lore brown then gold. Of course now I can’t return because it says it’s not eligible but on the description when purchasing there is no message that’s says no returns. Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Scott Bartos

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Cool and convenient however after a week or so the outer cover fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy  przenkop

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color base
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. What I didn’t like was that in the picture it shows a white base and when I got it, it has a black base. I’m using it but I would absolutely love if it was white instead of black base like it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna R.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, fell off on day 2
customer_reviews.text: The item was as described, however, it would not stick properly so it is basically useless. It fell off the phone(Samsung galaxy) after the 2nd day.
customer_reviews.author: cathy rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this is a fake
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is a fake. The stamping on the base doesn’t match my legit popsocket. Also won’t stick to phone case that previous popsocket sticks to fine. It doesn’t extend as far out either. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morss

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t even stick to my phone. I had this exact one before, but when I ordered a new one it doesn’t even stick. It keeps falling off resulting in me dropping my phone every time. The extension part of it doesn’t open the full way. Very disappointed in its manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a metallic gold but it's not. And pulls off the case if I use it for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Watson

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS BROWN
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this is a matte brown design that looks gold in the picture but it is not. It’s crap sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Color looks slightly different
customer_reviews.text: I love popsockets but this one looks different then it does in the pictures. The color is tan and its matte. I bought it because it looked gold and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Best popsocket I’ve used!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and useful... can’t hold this larger iPhone max without this!
customer_reviews.author: jwreader

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to apply. Fades a little after several months but worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CStar

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in the pictures, definitely not gold. I got over it and used it anyway. On my phone less than a week and came off! Not sticky enough to reattach. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Foodio54

product_meta.title: PopSockets: Collapsible Grip & Stand for Phones and Tablets - Golden Silence
product_meta.description: A PopSockets grip is more than a stylish phone accessory. It’s an opposable thumb for your phone. It lets you take selfies like a pro and share with your circle of fans, friends or embarrassing family members. It lets you text things you may or may not later regret with the greatest of ease. It lets you stand your phone up on an airplane tray table to watch a movie. When you’re done, it collapses flat like your bangs in a rainstorm. PopSockets grips are repositionable and stick to most devices and cases but may not stick to silicone or waterproof materials. The product includes a special 3M adhesive disc for attaching your grip directly to a glass-backed phone. You may also buy a separate “mount” to attach your phone to your dashboard, mirror, refrigerator, air conditioning vent or wherever you snack on content. Mmm…content. And now, a little something for all you specification geeks: Diameter: 1.56 inches, Height: .9 inches when expanded, .25 inches when collapsed. PopSockets offers its customers a limited, 3-year warranty on its products. Full warranty details are available on PopSockets’ website.
feature_bullets: Offers a secure grip so you can text with one hand, snap better photos, and stop phone drops
Functions as a convenient stand so you can watch videos on the fly
Allows for hands-free use with the PopSockets mount
Available in a broad range of styles and materials
PopSockets grip sticks to smooth and hard cases. Will not stick to SILICONE, HIGHLY TEXTURED CASES, and many SOFT cases.
